core.name: Core Passive: Brothers in Arms!
desc: When Anton uses his <ct color=#FFFFFF>Piledriver Attack</ct>, the skill's DMG is increased by <ct color=#2BAD00>12%</ct> and when he uses his <ct color=#FFFFFF>Drill Attack</ct>, the skill's DMG is increased by <ct color=#2BAD00>20%</ct>.

When Anton uses his <ct color=#FFFFFF>Piledriver Attack</ct>, the skill's DMG is increased by <ct color=#2BAD00>14%</ct> and when he uses his <ct color=#FFFFFF>Drill Attack</ct>, the skill's DMG is increased by <ct color=#2BAD00>23.3%</ct>.

When Anton uses his <ct color=#FFFFFF>Piledriver Attack</ct>, the skill's DMG is increased by <ct color=#2BAD00>16%</ct> and when he uses his <ct color=#FFFFFF>Drill Attack</ct>, the skill's DMG is increased by <ct color=#2BAD00>26.6%</ct>.

When Anton uses his <ct color=#FFFFFF>Piledriver Attack</ct>, the skill's DMG is increased by <ct color=#2BAD00>18%</ct> and when he uses his <ct color=#FFFFFF>Drill Attack</ct>, the skill's DMG is increased by <ct color=#2BAD00>30%</ct>.

When Anton uses his <ct color=#FFFFFF>Piledriver Attack</ct>, the skill's DMG is increased by <ct color=#2BAD00>20%</ct> and when he uses his <ct color=#FFFFFF>Drill Attack</ct>, the skill's DMG is increased by <ct color=#2BAD00>33.3%</ct>.

When Anton uses his <ct color=#FFFFFF>Piledriver Attack</ct>, the skill's DMG is increased by <ct color=#2BAD00>22%</ct> and when he uses his <ct color=#FFFFFF>Drill Attack</ct>, the skill's DMG is increased by <ct color=#2BAD00>36.6%</ct>.

When Anton uses his <ct color=#FFFFFF>Piledriver Attack</ct>, the skill's DMG is increased by <ct color=#2BAD00>24%</ct> and when he uses his <ct color=#FFFFFF>Drill Attack</ct>, the skill's DMG is increased by <ct color=#2BAD00>40%</ct>.

desc.0: When another character in your squad shares the same Attribute or Faction:
desc.1: While Anton is in <ct color=#FFFFFF>Burst Mode</ct>, for every 4 critical hits, the next attack hitting <ct color=#2EB6FF>Shocked</ct> enemies triggers an additional bout of <ct color=#2EB6FF>Shock</ct> DMG at 45% of the original DMG. This effect can trigger once every 0.5s.

1.name: Warm-Up Exercises
1.desc: When <ct color=#FFFFFF>Drill Attack</ct> hits an enemy, Anton gains additional Energy, up to a maximum of 5 Energy per skill use.

flavor.1: "Try and keep up. It's time to do our stretches!"

2.name: State of Flow
2.desc: When Anton uses his <ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</ct> and enters <ct color=#FFFFFF>Burst Mode</ct>, he gains a Shield that equals to 7.5% of his Max HP. While in <ct color=#FFFFFF>Burst Mode</ct>, entering combat or switching in reapplies the Shield effect. This effect can trigger once every 15s. The Shield dissipates when <ct color=#FFFFFF>Burst Mode</ct> ends.

flavor.0: After arduous training, a few lucky individuals will display exceptional vigor and perform above their usual level during high-intensity activities, entering a state of flow commonly known as "being in the zone."
flavor.1: Are you ready to get moving and enter the zone?
flavor.2: — Nitro-Fuel's exclusive program "Good Morning, Zealous Office Workers!"

3.name: Rotational Training
3.desc: <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dodge</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Assist</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack</ct>, and <ct color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</ct> Lv. +2
3.flavor: Knowing a bit of everything may seem underwhelming, but in a complex and ever-changing Hollow worksite, having a wide skillset can present an opportunity to overcome difficulties.

4.name: Everyone Get Fired Up!
4.desc: When Anton uses a <ct color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</ct> or <ct color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</ct>, all squad members' CRIT Rate increases by 10% for 12s.

flavor.0: "Find your rhythm, and let's get moving!"
flavor.1: When Anton starts to get serious, everyone becomes more nimble.
flavor.2: They have to keep up or else they will be training alone the next day.

5.name: Jack of All Trades
5.desc: <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dodge</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Assist</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack</ct>, and <ct color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</ct> Lv. +2
5.flavor: Knowing a bit of everything may seem underwhelming, but if you are resolute enough to change from "knowing a bit" to "being excellent," then you become omnipotent!

6.name: Break the Limit
6.desc: When Anton's <ct color=#FFFFFF>Piledriver Attack</ct> triggers a critical hit, his <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Enthusiastic Drills (Burst Mode)</ct> and <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dodge Counter: Overload Drill (Burst Mode)</ct> deal 4% more DMG for 30s, stacking up to 6 times. Repeated triggers reset the duration.

flavor.0: "Yeah bro, can you feel the burn?"
flavor.1: Whenever Anton wants to exceed his limits,
flavor.2: his "bro" starts spinning at an astonishing pace, its buzzing echoing Anton's resolution.
